BoosterPacks:Retribution.NAME: Retribution
BoosterPacks:Retribution.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your current Mantra !M! times. NL boosterpacks:Immutable.

BoosterPacks:Lamentation.NAME: Lamentation
BoosterPacks:Lamentation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have 2 or more Mantra, Gain !B! Block again and lose 2 Mantra.

BoosterPacks:Prophecy.NAME: Prophecy
BoosterPacks:Prophecy.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter Divinity, put !M! card from your draw pile into your hand.

BoosterPacks:TowerToHeaven.NAME: Tower To Heaven
BoosterPacks:TowerToHeaven.DESCRIPTION: While in hand, gain 1 Mantra whenever you play a card.
BoosterPacks:TowerToHeaven.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: While in hand, gain 1 Mantra whenever you play a card. NL Gain 2 Mantra.

BoosterPacks:Providence.NAME: Providence
BoosterPacks:Providence.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Mantra, gain !M! Block.

BoosterPacks:Pilgrimage.NAME: Pilgrimage
BoosterPacks:Pilgrimage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Mantra. NL End your turn.
BoosterPacks:Pilgrimage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Mantra. NL End your turn.

BoosterPacks:MindOverMatter.NAME: Mind Over Matter
BoosterPacks:MindOverMatter.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard 2 cards. NL Enter boosterpacks:Courage.

BoosterPacks:Bravery.NAME: Bravery
BoosterPacks:Bravery.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enter boosterpacks:Courage. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Cacophony.NAME: Cacophony
BoosterPacks:Cacophony.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you are in a Stance, exit it and draw 1 card.

BoosterPacks:Valor.NAME: Valor
BoosterPacks:Valor.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Draw 1 card. NL Enter boosterpacks:Courage.

BoosterPacks:Audacity.NAME: Audacity
BoosterPacks:Audacity.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL If you draw a Skill, enter boosterpacks:Courage. NL Exhaust.
BoosterPacks:Audacity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL If you draw a Skill, enter boosterpacks:Courage.

BoosterPacks:Determination.NAME: Determination
BoosterPacks:Determination.DESCRIPTION: If you are in boosterpacks:Courage, gain !B! Block. NL If not, enter boosterpacks:Courage.

BoosterPacks:Psychoanalysis.NAME: Psychoanalysis
BoosterPacks:Psychoanalysis.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the next X turns, NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark.
BoosterPacks:Psychoanalysis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of the next X+1 turns, NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark.

BoosterPacks:MentalScar.NAME: Mental Scar
BoosterPacks:MentalScar.DESCRIPTION: Apply !D! *Mark !M! times. NL Affected by damage modifiers.

BoosterPacks:Lecture.NAME: Lecture
BoosterPacks:Lecture.DESCRIPTION: Target loses HP equal to their *Mark. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.
BoosterPacks:Lecture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

BoosterPacks:Acupuncture.NAME: Acupuncture
BoosterPacks:Acupuncture.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses HP equal to 2 times their *Mark.
BoosterPacks:Acupuncture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enemy loses HP equal to 2 times their *Mark.

BoosterPacks:Traumatize.NAME: Traumatize
BoosterPacks:Traumatize.DESCRIPTION: Multiply the enemy *Mark by X. NL Exhaust.
BoosterPacks:Traumatize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Multiply by X+1 the enemy *Mark. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Freedom.NAME: Freedom
BoosterPacks:Freedom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Liberty into your hand.

BoosterPacks:Liberty.NAME: Liberty
BoosterPacks:Liberty.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose one: NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies, NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.
BoosterPacks:Liberty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose one: NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 2 times, NL Gain !B! Block 2 times. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:FlyHigh.NAME: Fly High
BoosterPacks:FlyHigh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 2 times.

BoosterPacks:SevenDays.NAME: Seven Days
BoosterPacks:SevenDays.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create non-curse, non-status cards, gain [W]. NL Gain 1 less [W] at the start of each turn.

BoosterPacks:Sacrifice.NAME: Sacrifice
BoosterPacks:Sacrifice.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Gain [W] [W]. NL Add 3 *Ravage into your hand.

BoosterPacks:Ravage.NAME: Ravage
BoosterPacks:Ravage.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Dazed into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Plague.NAME: Plague
BoosterPacks:Plague.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Add 2 *Pests to your hand.

BoosterPacks:Pest.NAME: Pest
BoosterPacks:Pest.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Despair.NAME: Despair
BoosterPacks:Despair.DESCRIPTION: If you have no orb slots, gain 1 Orb Slot. NL Channel 1 Dark. NL Add a *Hope to your hand.
BoosterPacks:Despair.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have no orb slots, gain 1 Orb Slot. NL Channel 1 Dark. NL Add a *Hope and a *Dream to your hand.

BoosterPacks:Hope.NAME: Hope
BoosterPacks:Hope.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Channel your rightmost orb X times. NL Exhaust.
BoosterPacks:Hope.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Channel your rightmost orb X+1 times. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Trinity.NAME: Trinity
BoosterPacks:Trinity.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Body, a *Mind and a *Soul to your hand.

BoosterPacks:BodyTrinity.NAME: Body
BoosterPacks:BodyTrinity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 2 times. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Enter Wrath. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:MindTrinity.NAME: Mind
BoosterPacks:MindTrinity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Enter boosterpacks:Courage. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:SoulTrinity.NAME: Soul
BoosterPacks:SoulTrinity.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb Slot. NL Channel a random orb. NL Gain 1 Focus. NL Enter Calm.

BoosterPacks:Encore.NAME: Encore
BoosterPacks:Encore.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your turn forcibly end, draw 1 card and discard 2 cards instead.
BoosterPacks:Encore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever your turn forcibly end, draw 1 card and discard 2 cards instead.

BoosterPacks:EmptyThought.NAME: Empty Thought
BoosterPacks:EmptyThought.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exit your Stance. NL Gain [W] .

BoosterPacks:SelfControl.NAME: Self Control
BoosterPacks:SelfControl.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Tranquility, a *Crescendo and a *Bravery into your hand. NL End your turn.

BoosterPacks:PathToVictory.NAME: Path To Victory
BoosterPacks:PathToVictory.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter Wrath, Calm and boosterpacks:Courage in the same turn, enter Divinity.
BoosterPacks:PathToVictory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you enter Wrath, Calm and boosterpacks:Courage in the same turn, enter Divinity.

BoosterPacks:Waltz.NAME: Waltz
BoosterPacks:Waltz.DESCRIPTION: On Stance change: NL Gain 1 Strength and Dexterity. NL Lose them at the end of your turn.

BoosterPacks:Reincarnation.NAME: Reincarnation
BoosterPacks:Reincarnation.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Strength. NL Gain X Dexterity. NL End your turn. NL Exhaust.
BoosterPacks:Reincarnation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X+1 Strength. NL Gain X+1 Dexterity. NL End your turn. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Choir.NAME: Choir
BoosterPacks:Choir.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! additional damage per Choir card played this turn.

BoosterPacks:Visions.NAME: Visions
BoosterPacks:Visions.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Scry, Scry for 1 more.
BoosterPacks:Visions.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you Scry, Scry for 1 more.

BoosterPacks:ThreadsOfFate.NAME: Threads Of Fate
BoosterPacks:ThreadsOfFate.DESCRIPTION: For every card you discard while you Scry, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

BoosterPacks:BlissfulIgnorance.NAME: Blissful Ignorance
BoosterPacks:BlissfulIgnorance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard every card you Scry. Gain !M! Block per card Scried.

BoosterPacks:FreeWill.NAME: Free Will
BoosterPacks:FreeWill.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Draw as much cards as you discarded.

BoosterPacks:MementoMori.NAME: Memento Mori
BoosterPacks:MementoMori.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies plus !M! damage per card Retained this combat. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:CarpeDiem.NAME: Carpe Diem
BoosterPacks:CarpeDiem.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL This turn, whenever you play a card, discard a card.

BoosterPacks:Friendship.NAME: Friendship
BoosterPacks:Friendship.DESCRIPTION: At the end of this turn, retain your entire hand. NL Exhaust.
BoosterPacks:Friendship.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL At the end of this turn, Retain your entire hand. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Discipline.NAME: Discipline
BoosterPacks:Discipline.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Retain a card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

BoosterPacks:Nostalgia.NAME: Nostalgia
BoosterPacks:Nostalgia.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that was retained last turn, draw 1 card.
BoosterPacks:Nostalgia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card that was Retained last turn, draw 1 card.

BoosterPacks:DejaVu.NAME: Déjà Vu
BoosterPacks:DejaVu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, plus !M! per card in your hand that was Retained last turn.

BoosterPacks:Revolution.NAME: Revolution
BoosterPacks:Revolution.DESCRIPTION: The first time you enter Calm in a turn, exit it and draw 1 card.

BoosterPacks:Faith.NAME: Faith
BoosterPacks:Faith.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL boosterpacks:Grave. NL Enter Divinity. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Loyalty.NAME: Loyalty
BoosterPacks:Loyalty.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Miracle to your hand.
BoosterPacks:Loyalty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a Miracle to your hand.

BoosterPacks:TheCalm.NAME: The Calm
BoosterPacks:TheCalm.DESCRIPTION: Adds a *The *Storm into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:TheStorm.NAME: The Storm
BoosterPacks:TheStorm.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, gain [W] [W] [W] and exhaust.
BoosterPacks:TheStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, gain [W] [W] [W] [W]  and exhaust.

BoosterPacks:DivineWind.NAME: Divine Wind
BoosterPacks:DivineWind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, plus !D! per energy left.

BoosterPacks:Salvation.NAME: Salvation
BoosterPacks:Salvation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Refills your energy. NL Exhaust.
